questionTitle: The prefix ................ is added to the adjective "successful" to make it opposite.
When we get ................. marks, we usually feel happy.
My sister went to the doctor because she could not ................ well.
we leave the library, we'll go right down the cafeteria.
Make sure ................. is no traffic.
My sister can't dance. I can't dance ....................
I ................. object to his plan.
Dick was loyal to ................ trusted him.
Two things that you cannot buy with money ................ love and loyalty.
The year 1620 was in the ................. century.
A person who ................ to eat would be dead in a month.
If Kate hadn't stayed up late last night, he ................ sleepy now.
It is important for the developed countries to reduce energy .................. as much as possible.
The wind ................. as a power source over 1,300 years ago in Persia when the first windmill was built to turn a millstone.
I worked ................. a civil servant five years ago.
The librarian lent him some books ............ he wanted .
What ................ does your son want to follow after he graduates?
The travel ................ plans holidays for people.
If a person buys a car for $500 and sells it for $600, he / she makes a ................ of $100.
Banking is the ................ activity of banks.
